Articles.Content: I'm just wondering, is there any word on whether old spaceplanes will still work with the new update? I'm not fussed about the craft files but I have some missions in progress so should I return these before the update?
It's better if you do, the craft files might need removing and replacing of wing parts I think.
It is my understanding that the parts getting replaced will be deprecated. Available to load crafts, but not to build new ones.
Don't take my word for it, but I think someone said the old parts would be around for .25 to give people a chance to swap out old parts with new ones.

You should at least make a back-up before you update.

Stock-craft should not be affected be the new update. Same goes for mod-craft after mods are brought up to date.

The only mod that I expect to cause some minor troubles is SP+. As SP+ will become stock some parts might have been renamed and/or remodelled.
I'll bring them back down to kerbin then and rebuild them. Just seems safer. I don't think that any of the few mods I use will be affected though.

It is my understanding that the parts getting replaced will be deprecated. Available to load crafts, but not to build new ones.

My understanding was that they would just put a warning on them that they will be going away but not remove them in any form for this build.
